# Government Tender Announcement: New Vehicle Access

### Solicitation Number:
2023-00996A

### Tender Description:
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites tenders for the construction of a new vehicle access driveway to the existing CFIA Port of Entry Inspection Station located in Emerson, Manitoba. The scope of work includes:

* Providing new pavement segments
* Installing new gates within the existing fence for access
* Relocating site signage and related work

### Construction Timeframe:
The contractor must complete the work by September 30, 2024.

### Optional Site Visit and Bidders' Conference:
A site visit will take place on September 12, 2023 at 10:00 a.m. at the CFIA Emerson-Noyes Point of Entry, Emerson, MB. A bidders' conference will be held on September 19, 2023 at 10:00 a.m. via MS Teams. This meeting is optional, but highly recommended for potential bidders.

### Submission Requirements:
Bids must be submitted only to the CFIA's Bid Receiving department by the closing date, time, and place indicated in the bid solicitation.

### Tender Specifications:
The following attachments are available for download:

* Annex A: Specifications
* Addendum No. 1: Site plans and details
* Attachment 2: Overview and site information
* CFIA Construction Invitation to Tender template (English)
* CFIA Construction Invitation to Tender template (French)

### Contact Information:
For more information, please contact:
Ashley Bennett
National Procurement & Contracting Service Centre (NPCSC)
 Canadian Food Inspection Agency
 [ashley.bennett@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:ashley.bennett@inspection.gc.ca)
 (343) 553-9512

### Tendering Process:
The tendering process is open and competitive.

### Trade Agreements:
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the World Trade Organization (WTO) Agreement.
